body.p: Dr Ewing went the Security of a young man named Samuel Moore alias Frazier Charged with Felony in Connexion with two other men and I am Satisfied from all the Circumstances and facts in the Case that Moore alias Frazier was in Company with these Two men and was Drunk and actually new nothing about the Felonious act Comited by his Comerades untill next Day while in Jail was informed what the Charge was. I hope you will Releave the Dr. because of believe it is just & Right & home you will so act
